mapper.select: select p.id,p.product_code as productCode,p.product_value as productValue,p.product_state as productState, p.createtime as createtime,p.update_state_date as updateStateDate,p.maintain_type as maintainType, p.update_maintain_date as updateMaintainDate,p.userId as userid, o.ddb_length as ddbLength,o.ddb_width as ddbWidth,o.ddb_height as ddbHeight,o.yjb_length as yjbLength, o.yjb_width as yjbWidth,o.yjb_height as yjbHeight from product p left join order_product op on p.id=op.product_id left join `order` o on op.order_id=o.id where o.id=#{oid}

select p.id as id,p.product_code as productCode,p.product_value as productValue,p.product_state as productState, p.createtime as createtime,p.update_state_date as updateStateDate,p.maintain_type as maintainType, p.update_maintain_date as updateMaintainDate,p.userId as userid, o.ddb_length as ddbLength,o.ddb_width as ddbWidth,o.ddb_height as ddbHeight, o.yjb_length as yjbLength,o.yjb_width as yjbWidth,o.yjb_height as yjbHeight, (select username from user where id=p.userId) as username from product p left join order_product op on p.id=op.product_id left join `order` o on o.id=op.order_id left join project_order po on o.id=po.order_id left join project pr on po.project_id=pr.id where 1=1
and p.product_code=#{scanCode}
